list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a statement or action expressing disapproval of or objection to something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Hungarian team lodged an official protest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đội Hungary nộp một cuộc biểu tình chính thức

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a written declaration, typically by a notary public, that a bill has been presented and payment or acceptance refused.
express an objection to what someone has said or done.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she wouldn't let him pay, and he didn't protest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô sẽ không để anh trả tiền, và anh không phản đối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: declare (something) firmly and emphatically in the face of stated or implied doubt or in response to an accusation.
write or obtain a protest in regard to (a bill).
